body.name: Foundations SafetyCraft Compact Slatted Daycare Crib, Durable Wood Construction, Non-Marking Casters (2 Locking), Includes 3” InfaPure Foam Mattress (Natural)
features: DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: The SafetyCraft wood crib is constructed of pine with mortise and tenon joinery for added durability. High quality construction includes advanced strength fasteners and a solid steel box frame crib mattress board that adjusts to 2 heights
NON-MARKING WHEELS: The quiet, non-marking casters make it easy to move this crib room-to-room without damaging floors. Two-wheels lock the crib in place when stationary
MATTRESS INLCUDED: Crib purchase includes a 3 inch ultra-durable InfaPure foam mattress
TEETHING RAIL: Child safe design features a smooth, plastic teething rail to protect babies and the crib from damage
SAFETY FIRST: Compliant with 16CFR1220. Tested to all mandatory regulations to keep your baby safe. Easy assembly required
body.description: Foundations SafetyCraft Fixed-Side Clearview Compact Crib An extraordinary value, offering good quality to your daycare SafetyCraft ensures that you do not have to sacrifice safety for affordability. Teething rail included for the protection of children and the longevity of the crib. Crib comes standard with a 3" InfaPure ultra-durable foam mattress and 2" non-marking ultra-quiet casters (two locking). Durable, fixed-side wood compact rib with clearview ends Non-marking, ultra quiet commercial casters (two-locking) Adjustable mattress board Includes a 3” ultra-durable foam InfaPure mattress

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Foundations cribs are the #1 most specified cribs in the U.S. Our products empower care givers to provide the highest quality care possible and are designed specifically to meet the unique demands of a commercial environment. Foundations is the brand your child care center can trust. Foundations SafetyCraft Fixed-Side Clearview Compact Crib An extraordinary value, offering good quality to your daycare SafetyCraft ensures that you do not have to sacrifice safety for affordability. Teething rail included for the protection of children and the longevity of the crib. Crib comes standard with a 3" InfaPure ultra-durable foam mattress and 2" non-marking ultra-quiet casters (two locking). Durable, fixed-side wood compact rib with clearview ends Non-marking, ultra quiet commercial casters (two-locking) Adjustable mattress board Includes a 3” ultra-durable foam InfaPure mattress

+ Add a CareShield Barrier for Added Protection with your Foundations SafetyCraft Crib (Sold Separately) CareShield Barrier Protection System provides extended height that acts as a room divider within a childcare center. This added protection may enable your daycare center to place cribs closer together and increase enrollment while providing added peace of mind for parents. (Childcare centers should check with their local licensing office for their recommended guidelines.) Patent Pending.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my licensed home daycare!
reviews.reviewText: I was very intimidated by the new state guidelines for cribs, and being that this was my first time enrolling infants in my child care home, I wanted to make sure it was perfect! I looked all over the Internet comparing cribs- both price and quality. I instantly knew that I would be purchasing a Foundations crib once I found them! I loved that it clearly stated in the description that they met all of the guidelines for child care centers- that made this an easy choice for me! Also, I loved that Amazon offered this crib cheaper then the website that I originally found it on! The only thing is I wish Amazon offered the zippered crib sheets like that website did, I had to purchase those separately, but I'm glad that they were available because I love the idea of zippered crib sheets! Highly recommend this crib, looks great in by baby room! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2011
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good.
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a simple, clean lined compact crib, that was also made with hardwoods, was sturdy, had adjustable mattress heights and could withstand a weight of more than 25lbs. This crib has met all of my criteria and I am very pleased with the ease of construction as well. I was able to assemble the piece myself in about a half hour. The base is sturdy and the mattress that was included is thick enough in my opinion. I also like that it has teething rail protectors included. I would like to mention as well that this crib is not very tall. Which is a plus for me being 5'2 and my husband is only 5'9 so this is perfect for us. All in all I am pleased with this purchase and hope when the baby comes they'll like it too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: this is a well made studry bed. it works perfect for our fire evacuation drills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Compact crib!
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best beds I have ever used. I am the director of a childcare center and we love them. They are easy to put together and are adjustable heights. The only negative is the fact that the entire bed needs to be put together with the allen wrenches and so when you raise and lower the mattress height the allen wrenches get stripped easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not as discribed
reviews.reviewText: I had ordered this crib because I recently got another one just like it and loved it. BUT when I went to assemble it, it was not like the product's description. It does not have the teething rail covering and it does not have the metal box mattress frame (it is springs). I feel like it is misleading to customers that are buying the crib for these features like I was. Unfortunately I do not have the option of returning it and have to use the crib despite my displeasure with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Product contains Lead, phthalates
reviews.reviewText: Product is made in China and contains Lead, phthalates in all components - including the teething rail and mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are state approved in SC
reviews.reviewText: Love the cribs we have had them for 3 years and they are still like new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great crib. The wheels allow easy movement and rocking
reviews.reviewText: Great crib. The wheels allow easy movement and rocking. We had twins and stay in two houses. I ended up buying 4 of them.
